data.name: Monkey See Monkey Doo Doo
data.description:
üéÖ Christmas Update ‚ùÑÔ∏è      
Winter Wonderland Maps & Santa Bongo's Secret Shop: Every map is now a snowy paradise! Plus, there's a brand-new X-Mas Island where you can snag cool holiday gear with your hard-earned rubies.

Themed Cosmetics & Hands-on Fun: Get your hands on... well, new Hand cosmetics! Plus, a bunch of wacky, interactive items like things you can eat, press, and shake to your heart's content.

Hidden Treasures: Dive into a revamped store experience and hunt for secrets - like a mysterious portal leading to a hidden market. Plus, uncover new secrets via the plane!

Holiday Hype & Icy Surprises: Groove to new Xmas tunes, run as the crocs ice skate, and pick a snowball fight. Enjoy a horde mode with a festive twist, and watch out for Skating Kyle ‚Äì he‚Äôs back and ready for action!

---
ABOUT

Live in the heart of the Bermuda Triangle with all your Monkey friends! Swing on vines, throw doo at your enemies, and climb everything! 

- Huge Maps: Explore the Bermuda Jungle, Floating Forests, Ancient Ruins, Lava Chasm, and more

- Unique Gamemodes: Be the first to collect 10 bananas or work together to fend off hordes of crocs -- new modes are coming all the time

- Monkey Apparel: Customize your body color, equip face & head cosmetics, and stylize your doo

changelog.change_log: Bug fixes and paint shop update

Hotfix.
* Fixed paint shop
* Fixed lobby sizes to allow for more than 6 players
* Fixed private matches
* Fixed horde mode bugs
* Fixed missing cosmetic variants
* Fixed some more bugs not known to the public

* New movement mechanic, ground pound with a double jump ability
* Hold poop for a stronger poop projectile.
* New hangout layout that helps players with decisions about playing or shopping.
* Simplified a lot of the game mechanics.

Hotfixes:
* Crash site leaderboard fixes
* Wrist UI leaderboard fixes
* Christmas cosmetic shop fixes
* Logout fixes
HOTFIX: We fixed the login streak crate reward and fixed some small bugs happening with the starter bundle and black market.

* Lobby Fixes
* Shop reset bug
* Leaderboard updates for Survival and Horde Mode
* small bug fixes

* Survival Game mode added with new soundtrack
* Health packs and Turrets added to survival game mode
* Lobby game mode UI updates
* Added public button so that people can host the game they want and make it public
* Sweet dealz has a new voucher deal tab with amazing deals
* Black market has the constellation bundle from MAY 4th.
* Audio updates to the tooting range
* Improved grabbing tolerance for competitive players
* Monkey masks Bundle, Ice Cream Bundle and Doo Sign Contest bundle added to the shop rotation
Server Fixes, Crate Reward Updates, Daily Task fixes and Horde Mode updates
Cosmetic fix for those that are testing the new 2.0 features. This will allow players to go back and forth between 2.0 and 1.10
Fixed some cosmetic problems coming from 2.0 version into the live version of the game. All Cosmetics Upgraded in any version of the game should work in both versions.
